django.contrib.gis.geos.prototypes.errcheck
===========================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.geos.prototypes.errcheck

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Error checking functions for GEOS ctypes prototype functions.



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.geos.prototypes.errcheck.free


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.geos.prototypes.errcheck.last_arg_byref
   django.contrib.gis.geos.prototypes.errcheck.check_dbl
   django.contrib.gis.geos.prototypes.errcheck.check_geom
   django.contrib.gis.geos.prototypes.errcheck.check_minus_one
   django.contrib.gis.geos.prototypes.errcheck.check_predicate
   django.contrib.gis.geos.prototypes.errcheck.check_sized_string
   django.contrib.gis.geos.prototypes.errcheck.check_string


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: free

.. py:function:: last_arg_byref(args)

   Return the last C argument's value by reference.


.. py:function:: check_dbl(result, func, cargs)

   Check the status code and returns the double value passed in by reference.


.. py:function:: check_geom(result, func, cargs)

   Error checking on routines that return Geometries.


.. py:function:: check_minus_one(result, func, cargs)

   Error checking on routines that should not return -1.


.. py:function:: check_predicate(result, func, cargs)

   Error checking for unary/binary predicate functions.


.. py:function:: check_sized_string(result, func, cargs)

   Error checking for routines that return explicitly sized strings.

   This frees the memory allocated by GEOS at the result pointer.


.. py:function:: check_string(result, func, cargs)

   Error checking for routines that return strings.

   This frees the memory allocated by GEOS at the result pointer.
